about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, Viaz Tyres Limited is Ahmedabad-based company engaged in the manufacturing of rubber tubes for bicycles, two and three-wheelers, passenger vehicles, and heavy-load industrial vehicles. The company also deals in ancillary products like Off The Road (OTR) Tyre tubes and Animal Driven Vehicle (ADV) Tubes, Engine Oil, and Grease on white labeling bases.

Company sells rubber tubes, bicycle tires, and ancillary products under the brand name "Viaz" in domestic as well as international markets.

The company has its production facility with installed capacity of manufacturing 7,00,000 Tube per Month at Nandasan near Ahmedabad, Gujarat India. It has 15 domestic distributors for rubber tubes across India. Company also has presence in 5 countries namely United States of America, Turkey, Romania, United Arab Amirates and Colombia.

Company recently started trading Tyres through an exclusive distributorship of Maxxis Rubbers Private Limited tires for Turkey.

faqs.question: What is the Viaz Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer:
Viaz Tyres IPO is a SME IPO of 3226000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹62 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on February 16, 2023, and closes on February 21, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Viaz Tyres IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Viaz Tyres IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Viaz Tyres IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Viaz Tyres IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Viaz Tyres IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Viaz Tyres IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Viaz Tyres IPO opens on February 16, 2023 and closes on February 21, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Viaz Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer: Viaz Tyres IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Viaz Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Viaz Tyres IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Viaz Tyres IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Viaz Tyres IPO will be done on Friday, February 24, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 28, 2023. Check the Viaz Tyres IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Viaz Tyres IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Viaz Tyres IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 1, 2023.
